title: Containers (Vector, List, Map, Set)
subject: C++ Programming
theory:
- **Vector**: Dynamic Array. O(1) random access. O(N) insert middle.
- **List**: Doubly Linked List. O(1) insert. O(N) access.
- **Map**: BST (Red-Black tree). Sorted Key-Value. O(logN).
- **Unordered Map**: Hash Table. O(1) avg.

common_mistakes.correction: `m["key"]` creates entry if not exists! Use `m.find()` or `m.count()` to check existence.
